snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia has pursued his strategy with subterfuge, propaganda and brazen military threat, taking aim as much at the United States and Europe as Ukraine itself.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir Putin has left little doubt that he intends to cripple Ukraine's new government, forcing it to make concessions or face de facto partition of eastern territories; has pursued strategy of subterfuge, propaganda and bold military threat, taking aim at the United States and Europe as much as Ukraine itself; it remains unclear whether he will order Russian troops to reinforce those already in Crimea, risking a more heated military and diplomatic conflict.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia has pursued his strategy with subterfuge, propaganda and brazen military threat, taking aim as much at the United States and Europe as Ukraine itself.

headline.main: Putin Engages in Test of Will Over Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Putin Engages in Test of Will Over Ukraine
